title: (Probably comprehensive) list of spelling errors
body:
I was making an EIP (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/4835) and including OpenZeppelin as a submodule in the assets (because I was using it in my reference impls), when the CI failed due to the following spelling errors:

```./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/package-lock.json:9342: vEw ==> view
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/package-lock.json:16026: vEw ==> view
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/package-lock.json:16641: vEw ==> view
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/package-lock.json:26020: vEw ==> view
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/package-lock.json:31325: vEw ==> view
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/package-lock.json:31825: vEw ==> view
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/CHANGELOG.md:459: libray ==> library
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/applyHarness.patch:74: consistant ==> consistent
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorBase.spec:176: completness ==> completeness
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorBase.spec:177: chages ==> changes, charges
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorBase.spec:180: seperately ==> separately
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorCountingSimple.spec:131: completness ==> completeness
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorCountingSimple.spec:132: chages ==> changes, charges
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorCountingSimple.spec:135: seperately ==> separately
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorCountingSimple.spec:208: priveleged ==> privileged
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/certora/specs/GovernorCountingSimple.spec:220: priveleged ==> privileged
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/interfaces/IERC2981.sol:19: payed ==> paid
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/utils/structs/DoubleEndedQueue.sol:27: could't ==> couldn't
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/utils/math/SafeMath.sol:31: substraction ==> subtraction
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/proxy/Proxy.sol:48: overriden ==> overridden
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/proxy/Proxy.sol:83: overriden ==> overridden
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/README.adoc:43: requiering ==> requiring
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:188: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:192: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:229: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:235: datas ==> data

./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:240: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:304: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:309: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:311: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/TimelockController.sol:314: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/Governor.sol:49: consummed ==> consumed
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/contracts/governance/Governor.sol:67: poping ==> popping, pooping

./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:28: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:38: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:42: datas ==> data

./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:166: overwritting ==> overwriting

./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:361: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:373: overwritting ==> overwriting
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:377: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:388: datas ==> data

./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:433: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:448: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:475: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:489: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:502: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:519: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:538: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:549: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:559: datas ==> data

./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:587: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:636: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/TimelockController.test.js:647: datas ==> data
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/test/governance/compatibility/GovernorCompatibilityBravo.test.js:218: doesnt ==> doesn't, does not
./assets/eip-4834/OpenZeppelin/audit/2017-03.md:136: modifers ==> modifiers
```

Some of these are likely false positives, but others are likely true spelling errors (e.g. `libray`, `datas`).

Thank you @Pandapip1

We'll have a look into all these findings!
